Articles.Content:
Hey guys, loving KSP!

Anyway... so I'm going on a rescue mission to resuce a stranded capsule in a jet of mine.

My question is: how do I switch back to the rocket whilst in EVA?

I've looked on other posts, but they say press the [ and ] button or the [ or ] button!

What is this and which button on the keyboard is this?

Thanks in advance.
